mapper.select: SELECT , channel_id , channel_name , created_date , last_updated_date , creator , last_updater FROM BUILDER_V1_CHANNEL WHERE channel_id = #{channelId, jdbcType=BINARY, typeHandler=com.ebson.skillserver.typeHandler.UUIDTypeHandler}
SELECT channel_id , channel_name , created_date , last_updated_date , creator , last_updater FROM BUILDER_V1_CHANNEL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BUILDER_V1_CHANNEL WHERE channel_id = #{channelId, jdbcType=BINARY, typeHandler=com.ebson.skillserver.typeHandler.UUIDTypeHandler}
